subSubSection.paragraph: Procris globulariae bosniaca Alberti, 1937: Int. Ent. Z. 51: 99

Invalid subspecific name. Synonym of Jordanita (Jordanita) globulariae globulariae ( Huebner , 1793).

Alberti (1937 c) proposed this name as subspecies of
Procris globulariae
Huebner (1793). The name was subsequently synonymized. The current combination is Jordanita (Jordanita) globulariae globulariae ( Huebner , 1793) ( Efetov and Tarmann 1995 ).
